A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't want to rant on this\, but it's bad when I have to remind myself the movie I'm watching is a Star Wars film at the end. The humor made me feel like I was watching a Marvel movie\, the plot holes were ridiculous\, they made the force seem like it could do anything\, or anyone can use the force\, and they unnecessarily killed Luke. That's just the tip of the iceberg.
